description: This file defines a Spring configuration class 'CorsConfig' that sets up global CORS policy using environment-driven properties. It configures allowed origins, methods, headers, credentials, and maximum age for CORS requests.

classes.name: CorsConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class that sets up CORS filters with properties.

methods.name: corsFilter
methods.description: Creates and configures a CorsFilter bean with CORS options based on environment properties.
